title: DWAC, Snap, Intel, Mattel: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: Snap shares plunged after its earnings report; Mattel lifted its sales outlook
body:
Stock futures are wavering after the S&P 500 reached its 55th record close of the year. Here’s what we’re watching ahead of Friday’s action.
Write to James Willhite at james.willhite@wsj.com
